title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but it has a valid value, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title when the key is provided in the properties file, even if it is left blank.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Leave the key in the properties file blank, but ensure it has a valid value. 2. Add the chart and verify if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
